#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
	#define gc getchar
#else
	#define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
	#define pc putchar
#else
	#define pc putchar_unlocked
#endif

#define ll long long int
#define rep(i, a, b) for(i = a; i<b; i++)
#define rev(i, a, b) for(i = a; i>=b; i--)

inline void inp(ll &x) {

    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

inline void write(ll a) {

	register char c;
	char snum[20];
	ll i=0;
	
	do
	{
		snum[i++]=a%10+48;
		a=a/10;
	}while(a!=0);
	
	i=i-1;
	
	while(i>=0)
		pc(snum[i--]);
	//pc('\n');
}

int main() {

	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	
	ll n, k, i, a, b, j, ans= 0;
	
	inp(n);
	inp(k);
	ll pos[n];
	rep(i,0,n)
		inp(pos[i]);
	
	sort(pos, pos+n);
	
	vector< pair<ll,ll> > v;
	vector< pair<ll,ll> >::iterator  it, beg, end;
	
	rep(i,0,k) {
	
		inp(a);
		inp(b);
		
		v.push_back(make_pair(a,b));
	}
	
	beg = v.begin();
	end = v.end();
	
	sort( beg, end);
	
	j =0;
	
	rep(i,0,k) {
	
		while(j<n && pos[j] >= v[i].first && pos[j] <= v[i].second) {
		
			//cout<<"inside "<<v[i].first<<" <= "<<pos[j]<< " <= "<<v[i].second<<endl;
			ans++;
			j++;
		}
		if(pos[j] < v[i].first) {
		
			i--;
			j++;
		}
		//cout<<v[i].first<<" <= "<<pos[j]<< " <= "<<v[i].second<<endl;
		if(j==n)
			break;
		
	}
	
	write(ans);
	pc('\n');
	
	
	return 0;
}
